name: New Circuits for Future Electric Appliances Rebate
description: Up to $500 per circuit (max $2,000 for 4 circuits) for prewiring future electric appliances; income-qualified customers may receive up to $1,000 per circuit (max $4,000)
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power offers rebates for Santa Clara residents to prewire circuits for future electric appliances, making electrification easier down the road.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $500 per circuit (max 4 circuits)
- Up to $2,000 total for standard customers
- Up to $1,000 per circuit for income-qualified
- Up to $4,000 total for income-qualified
- Prepares home for future electrification
- Add-on to other electrification rebate
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Must apply as add-on to other SVP electrification rebate
3. Have electrician install circuits for future appliances
4. Circuits for EV charger, water heater, dryer, etc.
5. Apply online through SVP rebate platform
6. Submit with main rebate application
